contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 28, 1937 D Haworth Contest
Haworth Contest 0 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
haworth-contest
None
Test Piece Contest
Il Pirata [unknown arranger]
Central Park, Haworth, Yorkshire Prizes - 1st £12 and cup, 2nd £8, 3rd £4, 4th £2. March Contest - 1st(£2) Yorkshire Copper Works, 2nd(£1) Standfast Works. Hymn tune contest - 1st Denby Dale, 2nd Hade Edge. Promoted by Haworth Prize Band. 8 bands competed.
Jan. 15, 2014, 2:03 p.m. Jan. 19, 2019, 11:09 a.m.
1 Denby Dale Brass Noel Thorpe
2 Hade Edge William Pollard
3 Standfast Works Arthur Brownbill
4 Yorkshire Imperial Brass Band Joseph Elliott
